keyMoments.title: Maidy's Debut
keyMoments.description: Maidy appears as a servant at Alubarna Palace, helping prepare Princess Vivi for her coming-of-age ceremony.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this palace servant, establishing the support staff at the royal palace.

reveals.information: Works as a lady's maid for the Nefertari Family at Alubarna Palace

name.japanese: ネフェルタリ・ティティ

keyMoments.title: Nefertari Titi Appears in Flashback
keyMoments.description: Queen Titi appears in flashback as King Cobra reflects on how much Vivi resembles her late mother.
keyMoments.significance: First visual appearance of Vivi's mother, providing emotional context for Vivi's decision to stay with her family and country.

statusHistory.note: Died when Vivi was very young

relationships.description: Mother of Princess Vivi. Vivi is said to be the spitting image of her mother.

reveals.information: Mother of Princess Vivi and wife of King Cobra
Had flowing blue hair and bore a striking resemblance to her daughter Vivi
Deceased - died when Vivi was very young

keyMoments.title: Vivi's Speech About Her Adventures
keyMoments.description: Vivi delivers a metaphorical speech from the Eastern Port, describing her journey with the Straw Hats as a ship that never lost its way.
keyMoments.significance: Vivi publicly acknowledges her adventures while maintaining her royal duties and commitment to Alabasta.
keyMoments.quote: This ship never lost its way in the darkness and crossed over monstrous waves as if they were dancing.

keyMoments.title: Vivi Chooses Alabasta Over Adventure
keyMoments.description: Vivi makes the heart-wrenching decision to stay in Alabasta and fulfill her duties as princess rather than continue sailing with the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: The culmination of Vivi's character arc - choosing duty over personal desire, demonstrating incredible maturity and selflessness.
keyMoments.quote: I came to say goodbye. I will be staying behind.

keyMoments.title: Vivi Asks About Their Friendship
keyMoments.description: Vivi tearfully asks the Straw Hats if they would still call her their friend if they ever meet again.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Vivi's deepest fear - that leaving the crew means losing their friendship. Sets up the iconic X mark farewell.
keyMoments.quote: If we ever meet again, would you still call me your friend?

keyMoments.title: The X Mark Farewell
keyMoments.description: Vivi and Karoo raise their X-marked arms in response to the Straw Hats' silent gesture, confirming their eternal friendship without words.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most iconic moments in One Piece - a silent confirmation of unbreakable friendship that transcends physical presence.

relationships.description: Daughter of the late Queen Titi, said to be her spitting image.

reveals.information: Chooses to stay in Alabasta to fulfill her royal duties rather than join the Straw Hat Pirates
Despite leaving, remains an eternal friend and honorary member of the Straw Hat crew, symbolized by the X mark

keyMoments.title: Bon Kurei Impersonates Luffy
keyMoments.description: Bon Kurei uses his Mane Mane no Mi powers to transform into Luffy, creating a diversion to confuse the Marines about which ship holds the real Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Bon Kurei's complete transformation from enemy to ally, using his abilities to help rather than harm the crew.

keyMoments.title: Bon Kurei's Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: Bon Kurei and his crew directly engage Hina's Marine forces, sacrificing their own safety to allow the Going Merry to escape and reunite with Vivi.
keyMoments.significance: Completes Bon Kurei's redemption arc, cementing him as one of the series' most selfless characters. His sacrifice saves the crew and enables Vivi's farewell.

abilities.description: Transforms into Luffy to create a diversion for the Marines, demonstrating his Clone-Clone Fruit powers.

reveals.information: Fully redeemed from his role as a Baroque Works agent, now willing to sacrifice himself for the Straw Hats

keyMoments.title: Nami Protects Vivi
keyMoments.description: Nami stops Luffy from verbally answering Vivi's question about friendship, explaining that the Marines would brand Vivi a criminal if they acknowledged her connection to the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's intelligence and care for Vivi, protecting her from the consequences of being publicly associated with pirates.
keyMoments.quote: Luffy! If you respond, they'll brand her a criminal. The Marines have seen Vivi!

keyMoments.title: Igaram's Nightmare
keyMoments.description: Igaram has a nightmare about Vivi declaring she wants to become the Pirate Queen, revealing his anxiety about her potential decision to leave.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Igaram's deep concern for Vivi and his fear that she might choose piracy over her royal duties.

keyMoments.title: Igaram Impersonates Vivi
keyMoments.description: Igaram disguises himself as Vivi to stand in at the official ceremony, buying her time to say goodbye to the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Igaram's loyalty to Vivi, helping her make her farewell even if it means participating in deception.

keyMoments.title: Hina Uses Ori Ori no Mi
keyMoments.description: Hina demonstrates her Ori Ori no Mi (Cage-Cage Fruit) powers against the Straw Hats, creating iron restraints that damage the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: First direct combat use of Hina's Devil Fruit powers against the main crew, establishing her as a formidable Marine officer.
keyMoments.quote: Hina is angry. You pirates won't escape.

abilities.abilityName: Ori Ori no Mi - Iron Cage Creation
abilities.description: Creates iron restraints and cages to bind opponents and damage ships.

reveals.information: Uses Ori Ori no Mi powers in direct combat against the Straw Hat Pirates
